Tattoo Studio

Welcome!

We are an established custom tattoo studio, by appointment only.
The studio celebrated it's 10th Anniversary in February 2025.
We offer tattoos by the hour, half-day session, full-day sessions and piece specific work.
All our artists are capable of a multitude of different styles and have many years of experience under their belts. They are always happy to receive a new challenge.
Visit us for your next permanent body-art piece.


Fully up-to-date with all necessary health and safety practices.
All certification available upon request.

Services

By the hour

Some tattoos can be small and may take an hour at a time to complete so we offer hourly rates for this reason.

£80 p/h

Half-day session

Some larger tattoos can take a minimum of half a day to complete so we offer discounted rates on a half-day session.

£300

Full-day session

Some tattoos can take multiple sessions over several days to complete so we offer discounted rates on full-day sessions.

£550

Piece specific*

Some tattoos may take a few hours at a time to complete. We suggest contacting us for a quote on specific pieces.

*varied price

Testimonials

What a lovely atmosphere in Tattoo Studio. I will recommend to everyone I know to come here.

Everyone was very friendly. I will be telling everybody about Tattoo Studio and will certainly visit again.

Had my first session on my arm sleeve today with Flynn. He was very professional and brilliant at his job.

I started some blackout work with Eddie today and she was very friendly and let me take as many breaks as I needed.

I got some great old-school work done today by Joe. He made a design just like I pictured and it looks amazing.

I contacted the studio using the booking form to ask a question about a specific piece and they answered very quickly.

I found the website very helpful and easy to navigate. I found the opening times and contact details very fast.

I have had lots of artwork done by all the artists at Tattoo Studio and I have to say I can't pick a favourite.
